statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT maintenance_description, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Cleaning';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC, log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY maintenance_type;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY device_id ASC, log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%inspection%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT maintenance_date, log_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date = '2023-01-15'
SELECT device_id, log_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE device_id = 1001
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, log_description FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, frequency FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE device_id = 2001
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs INNER JOIN maintenance_schedules ON maintenance_logs.device_id = maintenance_schedules.device_id
SELECT * FROM DeviceMaintenanceLogs;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_date FROM DeviceMaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_description FROM DeviceMaintenanceLogs WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices WHERE device_type = 'Pulse Oximeter';
SELECT device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM MedicalDevices ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices WHERE device_type = 'Heart Monitor';
SELECT device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM MedicalDevices ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM MedicalDevices WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT d.device_name, s.scheduled_date FROM MedicalDevices d JOIN DeviceSchedules s ON d.device_id = s.device_id;
SELECT d.device_name, l.maintenance_date, l.maintenance_description FROM MedicalDevices d LEFT JOIN DeviceMaintenanceLogs l ON d.device_id = l.device_id;
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM Device WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Device WHERE maintenance_schedule = 'Weekly';
SELECT log_id, log_date, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, service_date, service_details FROM ServiceRecord ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Device ORDER BY device_name ASC;

SELECT Device.device_id, Device.device_name, MaintenanceLog.log_date, MaintenanceLog.service_type, Technician.technician_name FROM Device JOIN MaintenanceLog ON Device.device_id = MaintenanceLog.device_id JOIN Technician ON MaintenanceLog.technician_name = Technician.technician_name WHERE Technician.specialization = 'Electronics' ORDER BY MaintenanceLog.log_date DESC;

SELECT sl.device_id, sl.service_date, sl.service_details, d.device_name FROM (SELECT MaintenanceLog.device_id, ServiceRecord.service_date, ServiceRecord.service_details FROM MaintenanceLog JOIN ServiceRecord ON MaintenanceLog.log_id = ServiceRecord.log_id) AS sl JOIN Device AS d ON sl.device_id = d.device_id WHERE sl.service_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sl.service_date;

SELECT d.device_name, COUNT(sr.record_id) AS total_services FROM Device AS d LEFT JOIN MaintenanceLog AS ml ON d.device_id = ml.device_id LEFT JOIN ServiceRecord AS sr ON ml.log_id = sr.log_id GROUP BY d.device_name ORDER BY total_services DESC;
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Device ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM Device WHERE device_type = 'Laptop';
SELECT schedule_id, device_id, maintenance_frequency FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Device WHERE device_type = 'Printer';
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM Device WHERE device_location = 'Office';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_id, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE log_id = 'f28fdbb0-6f3f-482d-8695-5b887fa7d096';
SELECT technician_name, technician_experience_years FROM Technician;
